Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities

Class LevelStatus

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities.LevelStatus
public class LevelStatus extends Object
This class includes some utilities that facilitate noting the game winning status such as win, lose and victory, along with some methods that provides to set the field.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility, SINGLETON Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916

  • Method Details

    • resetWinningStatus

      public static void resetWinningStatus()
      Private constructor which initializes the winning status data.
      Demonstrates SINGLETON Design Pattern.

    • getGameWinningStatus

      public static int getGameWinningStatus()
      Static Method to Get the status of the game winning states.
      Returns:
      2 if victory, 1 if win, 0 if lose and -1 if the game should continue.
      Demonstrates SINGLETON Design Pattern.

    • hero_dead

      public static void hero_dead()
      Static Method to Notify the status that the hero is dead.
      If the hero still has lives left, the lives will be deducted 1, otherwise the player loses

    • setWin

      public static void setWin​(boolean win)
      Static Method to set the win field
      Parameters:
      win - The new win status to be saved in the field

    • setLose

      public static void setLose​(boolean lose)
      Static Method to set the lose field
      Parameters:
      lose - The lose win status to be saved in the field

    • setVictory

      public static void setVictory​(boolean victory)
      Static Method to set the victory field
      Parameters:
      victory - The new victory status to be saved in the field
